column5: You may be giving out more information than you think when posting online photo's taken on a Smart Phone.
Thanks for the heads up Rick. I had already turned off my geo-tagging feature but I didn't realize it could be so precise! Will be sharing this link elsewhere.
So much for getting musky spots now..... Thanks for the heads up!
Its funny what some smart phones store in their EXIF data   Good thing is, if you upload your photo to PhotoBucket, it strips ALL EXIF, including any GPS information.
gotta love the scare tactics.  keep them scared, they'll keep spending!
"they'll keep spending!" Video gave the solution & it's free. Turn off the geo tagging feature for the photo's.
I'll have to check this out @ home.
